DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine health effect 4 week intake drink manufactured lupine protein hydrolysates healthy volunteer . For , blood marker inflammation , oxidative stress , carbohydrate , lipid , protein liver metabolism , together general hematology blood coagulation assess baseline time ( day 0 ) ( day +14 , +28 +42 ) drink ingestion .
DOC.brief_title: Immunomodulatory Antioxidant Effects Drink Manufactured From Lupine Protein Hydrolysates
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective present study verify hypothesis intake drink base lupine peptide beneficial effect immune oxidative status . The secondary objective : - Assess effect drink biological parameter carbohydrate , lipid , protein liver metabolism well hematology blood coagulation . - Assess whether new product well tolerate . - Evaluate effect drink general health volunteer general health test 36 item . - Determine degree drink acceptability acceptability Likert test .
DOC.criteria: Subject 18 50 year old Body mass index 19 26 kg/m2 No severe disease Biochemical marker within normal range No previous history drug abuse Negative serology hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) , hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) HIV Women must negative pregnancy test The volunteer sign informed consent approve Ethics Committees Clinical Trials Preexisting disease Treatment antiinflammatory , antipyretic antibiotic drug Smoker Harmful alcohol consumption accord WHO standard Pregnant woman Hypersensitivity lupine , corn xanthan gum . Allergies plant derivative celiac . Participation another clinical trial . Blood donation previous three month . Any circumstance accord research team may lead increase risk voluntary
